snippet: Tony Parker had 25 points and 10 assists Tuesday night to lead host San Antonio past Golden State, 109-91.
abstract: San Antonio Spurs defeat Golden State Warriors, 109-91, to take 3-2 lead in their Western Conference semifinal series; other NBA news noted.
lead_paragraph: Tony Parker had 25 points and 10 assists Tuesday night to lead host San Antonio past Golden State, 109-91.

headline.seo: Spurs Rout Warriors for 3-2 Series Lead
headline.main: Spurs Rout Warriors for 3-2 Series Lead
headline.print_headline: Spurs Rout Warriors for 3-2 Series Lead
